sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Tsunami</radical> vs <radical>lifeguard</radical>. Who will win? After the water drains away, we find the lifeguard in the <kanji>gutter</kanji>.
meaningInfo: To be fair, it's pretty obvious who would win. Nobody knows what that lifeguard was thinking.
readingMnemonic: In the <kanji>gutter</kanji> is a lifeguard, so Emperor <ja><reading>こう</reading>いち</ja> decides to survey the damage.
readingInfo:
"This lifeguard didn't believe in the power of kanji learning," <ja>こういち</ja> says to the press. "He was punished by the great Crabigator, who sent its tsunami as a warning for all."

Hint: when you see the "lifeguard" radical, the reading is probably going to be <ja>こう</ja>.
